name: hv_feature_reg_t
desc: The type that defines feature registers.

items.name: var HV_FEATURE_REG_ID_AA64DFR0_EL1: hv_feature_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies debug feature register 0, EL1 (DFR0_EL1).

items.name: var HV_FEATURE_REG_ID_AA64DFR1_EL1: hv_feature_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies debug feature register 1, EL1 (DFR1_EL1).

items.name: var HV_FEATURE_REG_ID_AA64ISAR0_EL1: hv_feature_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies instruction set attribute register 0, EL1 (ISAR0_EL1).

items.name: var HV_FEATURE_REG_ID_AA64ISAR1_EL1: hv_feature_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies instruction set attribute register 1, EL1 (ISAR_EL1).

items.name: var HV_FEATURE_REG_ID_AA64MMFR0_EL1: hv_feature_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies memory model feature register 0, EL1(MMFR0_EL1).

items.name: var HV_FEATURE_REG_ID_AA64MMFR1_EL1: hv_feature_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies memory model feature register 1, EL1 (MMFR1_EL1).

items.name: var HV_FEATURE_REG_ID_AA64MMFR2_EL1: hv_feature_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies memory model feature register 2, EL1 (MMFR2_EL1).

items.name: var HV_FEATURE_REG_ID_AA64PFR0_EL1: hv_feature_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies processor feature register 0, EL1 (PFR0_EL1).

items.name: var HV_FEATURE_REG_ID_AA64PFR1_EL1: hv_feature_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies processor feature register 1, EL1 (PFR1_EL1).

items.name: var HV_FEATURE_REG_CLIDR_EL1: hv_feature_reg_t
items.desc: The value that describes Cache Level ID Register, EL1.

items.name: var HV_FEATURE_REG_CTR_EL0: hv_feature_reg_t
items.desc: The value that describes Cache Type Register, EL0.

items.name: var HV_FEATURE_REG_DCZID_EL0: hv_feature_reg_t
items.desc: The values that describes Data Cache Zero ID Register, EL0.

items.name: var rawValue: UInt32
items.desc: A 32-bit unsigned integer that represents the hardware feature registers.

items.name: init(UInt32)
items.desc: Creates a new instance of the hardware feature registers.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt32)
items.desc: Creates a new instance of the hardware feature registers.
